text: DeWayne Barrett (born December 27, 1981) is a Jamaican sprinter who specializes in the 400 meters. He won a silver medal in the 4x400 m relay at the 2008 World Indoor Championships in Valencia, along with Michael Blackwood, Edino Steele, and Adrian Findlay. He also won a silver medal in the 2005 Summer Universiade in the 400 m. He attended St. John's University in New York City, and graduated in 2005. == References == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Jamaican male sprinters Category:World Athletics Indoor Championships medalists Category:Universiade silver medalists for Jamaica Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Medalists at the 2005 Summer Universiade
title: DeWayne Barrett
